Class SampleTask

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.task.Task
com.msasc.lib.task.sample.SampleTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Callable<Void>
public class SampleTask extends Task
Sample task used to test pool options.
Author:
Miquel Sas

  • Constructor Details

    • SampleTask

      public SampleTask(String id, int iterations, int throwAfterIterations, long sleep)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - Id or name.
      iterations - Number of iterations.
      throwAfterIterations - Number of iterations to throw an exception, if less or equal to zero no exception is thrown.
      sleep - Milliseconds to sleep at each iteration.

  • Method Details

    • getTasks

      public static List<SampleTask> getTasks(int count, int iterations, int minSleep, int maxSleep, boolean throwException)
      Creates a list of sample tasks.
      Parameters:
      count - Number of tasks.
      iterations - Iterations per task.
      minSleep - Minimum sleep.
      maxSleep - Maximum sleep.
      throwException - Force to throw an exception.
      Returns:
      A list of sample tasks.

      Parameters:
      prefix - Termination prefix.
      count - Number of tasks.
      iterations - Iterations per task.
      minSleep - Minimum sleep.
      maxSleep - Maximum sleep.
      throwException - Force to throw an exception.
      suffix - Supplier of termination suffix.
      Returns:
      A list of sample tasks.
